title: Redesigning Mathematics Lectures Based on the DIME Model: Core Competency Enhancement Course for Managers

context.additional_context: Process of redesigning math lectures for corporate managers/leaders using the DIME model’s iterative design process, requiring collaborative and practice-centered design with BYOD.

learning_goals: Construct a mathematics lecture design framework utilizing the four elements (Design, Interaction, Media, Evaluation) of the DIME model
Propose three or more collaborative activity design plans that promote learner interaction
Develop and apply strategies for utilizing digital/analog media in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment
Design a hybrid assessment system combining formative and summative assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
